subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[鎌]]}} ''(Orthodox {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional form}} of ''<big>䥥</big>'' in Taiwan based on {{w|Zhengzitong}} dictionary. Considered a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant}} {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional form}} of {{l|mul|鐮}} in mainland China)''
* {{l|mul|[[鐮]]}} ''(Orthodox {{w|Traditional Chinese|traditional form}} of ''<big>䥥</big>'' in mainland China)''
* {{l|mul|[[镰]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese|Simplified form}} of {{l|mul|鐮}})''
